import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import seaborn as sns
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import warnings
import openpyxl

warnings.filterwarnings('ignore')

source.757ca3c2:
FI = Find_Similar(Facebook.PageName,Instagram.Owner)
FY = Find_Similar(Facebook.PageName,Youtube.Channel)
FT = Find_Similar(Facebook.PageName,Tiktok.Owner)
FTw = Find_Similar(Facebook.PageName,Twitter.Owner)
YI  = Find_Similar(Instagram.Owner,Youtube.Channel)
YT = Find_Similar(Youtube.Channel,Tiktok.Owner)
YTw = Find_Similar(Youtube.Channel,Twitter.Owner)
IT = Find_Similar(Instagram.Owner,Tiktok.Owner)
ITw = Find_Similar(Instagram.Owner,Twitter.Owner)
TTw  = Find_Similar(Tiktok.Owner,Twitter.Owner)
Similar = list(set(FI+FY+FT+FTw+YI+YT+YTw+IT+ITw+TTw))
source.03832fc6:
Simi_df = pd.DataFrame(Similar, columns=['Names'])
v1 = Youtube[Youtube.Channel.isin(Similar)][['Subscribers(millions)','Channel']]

v1['Names'] = v1['Channel']
v1['Youtube Subscriber (Millions)'] = v1['Subscribers(millions)']
v1 = v1.drop(['Channel','Subscribers(millions)'],axis=1)

v2 = Facebook[Facebook.PageName.isin(Similar)][['Followers(millions)','PageName']]

v2['Names'] = v2['PageName']
v2['Facebook Follower (Millions)'] = v2['Followers(millions)']
v2 = v2.drop(['PageName','Followers(millions)'],axis=1)

v3 = Instagram[Instagram.Owner.isin(Similar)][['Followers(millions)','Owner']]

v3['Names'] = v3['Owner']
v3['Instagram Followers (Millions)'] = v3['Followers(millions)']
v3 = v3.drop(['Owner','Followers(millions)'],axis=1)

v4 = Tiktok[Tiktok.Owner.isin(Similar)][['Followers(millions)','Owner']]

v4['Names'] = v4['Owner']
v4['TikTok Followers (Millions)'] = v4['Followers(millions)']
v4 = v4.drop(['Owner','Followers(millions)'],axis=1)

v5 = Twitter[Twitter.Owner.isin(Similar)][['Followers(millions)','Owner']]

v5['Names'] = v5['Owner']
v5['Twitter Followers (Millions)'] = v5['Followers(millions)']
v5 = v5.drop(['Owner','Followers(millions)'],axis=1)


Similar_df = pd.merge(pd.merge(pd.merge(pd.merge(pd.merge(Simi_df,v1, on='Names',how='outer'),v2,on='Names',how='outer'),v3,on='Names',how='outer'),v4,on='Names',how='outer'),v5,on='Names',how='outer')
Similar_df = Similar_df.fillna(0)
Similar_df
source.d7d2653b:
plt.figure(figsize=(20,5))
sns.barplot(data=Similar_df, palette='Blues_r')
plt.title('Follower According to Different Social Media Platform')

Similar_df.plot(x="Names", y=['Youtube Subscriber (Millions)',
       'Facebook Follower (Millions)', 'Instagram Followers (Millions)',
       'TikTok Followers (Millions)', 'Twitter Followers (Millions)'], kind="bar",figsize=(30,10))
plt.title("People Which are Famous More than Two Social Media Sites")
source.518a3897: Similar_df['Total Follower (Millions)'] = Similar_df['Facebook Follower (Millions)']+Similar_df['Instagram Followers (Millions)']+Similar_df['Youtube Subscriber (Millions)']+Similar_df['TikTok Followers (Millions)']+Similar_df['Twitter Followers (Millions)']
source.220f3f38:
plt.figure(figsize=(10,12))
sns.barplot(y= 'Names',x='Total Follower (Millions)',data=Similar_df.sort_values(by='Total Follower (Millions)',ascending=False),palette='Blues_r')
plt.title('World Most Famous Personalities')
source.94e9e017:
FI = Find_Similar(Facebook.Country,Instagram.Country)
FY = Find_Similar(Facebook.Country,Youtube.Country)
FT = Find_Similar(Facebook.Country,Tiktok.Country)
FTw = Find_Similar(Facebook.Country,Twitter.Country)
YI  = Find_Similar(Instagram.Country,Youtube.Country)
YT = Find_Similar(Youtube.Country,Tiktok.Country)
YTw = Find_Similar(Youtube.Country,Twitter.Country)
IT = Find_Similar(Instagram.Country,Tiktok.Country)
ITw = Find_Similar(Instagram.Country,Twitter.Country)
TTw  = Find_Similar(Tiktok.Country,Twitter.Country)
Similar_Couts = list(set(FI+FY+FT+FTw+YI+YT+YTw+IT+ITw+TTw))
source.22bf369b:
Simi_df2 = pd.DataFrame(Similar_Couts, columns=['Country'])
v1 = Youtube[Youtube.Country.isin(Similar_Couts)][['Subscribers(millions)','Country']]

v1['Youtube Subscriber (Millions)'] = v1['Subscribers(millions)']
v1 = v1.drop(['Subscribers(millions)'],axis=1)

v2 = Facebook[Facebook.Country.isin(Similar_Couts)][['Followers(millions)','Country']]

v2['Facebook Follower (Millions)'] = v2['Followers(millions)']
v2 = v2.drop(['Followers(millions)'],axis=1)

v3 = Instagram[Instagram.Country.isin(Similar_Couts)][['Followers(millions)','Country']]

v3['Instagram Followers (Millions)'] = v3['Followers(millions)']
v3 = v3.drop(['Followers(millions)'],axis=1)

v4 = Tiktok[Tiktok.Country.isin(Similar_Couts)][['Followers(millions)','Country']]

v4['TikTok Followers (Millions)'] = v4['Followers(millions)']
v4 = v4.drop(['Followers(millions)'],axis=1)

v5 = Twitter[Twitter.Country.isin(Similar_Couts)][['Followers(millions)','Country']]

v5['Twitter Followers (Millions)'] = v5['Followers(millions)']
v5 = v5.drop(['Followers(millions)'],axis=1)

Similar_df2 = pd.merge(pd.merge(pd.merge(pd.merge(pd.merge(Simi_df2,v1, on='Country',how='outer'),v2,on='Country',how='outer'),v3,on='Country',how='outer'),v4,on='Country',how='outer'),v5,on='Country',how='outer')
Similar_df2 = Similar_df2.fillna(0)
Similar_df2 = Similar_df2.groupby('Country').sum().reset_index()
source.1a71deae: Similar_df2['Total Follower (Millions)'] = Similar_df2['Facebook Follower (Millions)']+Similar_df2['Instagram Followers (Millions)']+Similar_df2['Youtube Subscriber (Millions)']+Similar_df2['TikTok Followers (Millions)']+Similar_df2['Twitter Followers (Millions)']
source.f5815663:
plt.figure(figsize=(10,12))
sns.barplot(y= 'Country',x='Log Total',data=Similar_df2.sort_values(by='Total Follower (Millions)',ascending=False),palette='Blues_r')
plt.title('World Most Famous Personalities Place')
